dmp.title: DMP for Buenos Aires Plant-Flower Visitor Interactions Dataset
dmp.description: This Data Management Plan outlines management, sharing, and preservation of a plant–flower visitor dataset collected in Buenos Aires County, Argentina, as part of the WorldFAIR WP10 Plant-Pollinator case study. The dataset is hosted on Zenodo and indexed by GloBI.

dataset.title: Plant-Flower Visitor Interactions Recorded in Argentina (Buenos Aires)
dataset.description: Dataset of 522 plant–flower visitor interaction records from 21 sites in Buenos Aires county, Argentina. Records collected in 2018 by field surveys, curated and FAIR-ified under REBIPP and SALURBAL guidance. Indexed in GloBI and hosted on Zenodo.

metadata.description: Used to structure biodiversity interaction data for interoperability.

dmp.preservation_statement: Zenodo provides long-term preservation with persistent DOI. GloBI indexes metadata to ensure continued access and discoverability.

project.title: Plant-Flower Visitor Pilot Study – WorldFAIR WP10
project.description: Field study collecting interaction data in Argentina under the Brazil-led REBIPP/GloBI plant-pollinator pilot. Aligned with WorldFAIR's agricultural biodiversity FAIR guidelines.
